Package org.apache.fop.render.afp.extensions

Class Summary
AbstractAFPExtensionObject Base class for the AFP-specific extension elements.
AFPAttribute This class extends the org.apache.fop.fo.StringProperty.Maker inner class in order to provide a static property maker.
AFPElementMapping AFPElementMapping object provides the ability to extract information from the formatted object that reside in the afp namespace.
AFPExtensionAttachment This is the pass-through value object for the AFP extension.
AFPExtensionHandler ContentHandler (parser) for restoring AFPExtension objects from XML.
AFPExtensionHandlerFactory Factory for the ContentHandler that handles serialized AFPPageSetup instances.
AFPIncludeFormMap This extension allows to include an AFP form map resource.
AFPIncludeFormMapElement This class extends the ExtensionObj class.
AFPInvokeMediumMap This is the pass-through value object for the AFP extension.
AFPInvokeMediumMapElement This class represents an AFP-specific extension element to embed Invoke Medium Map (IMM) fields at the beginning of a page group or just prior to a Page.
AFPPageOverlay This extension allows to include an AFP Page Overlay resource.
AFPPageOverlayElement This class extends the org.apache.fop.render.afp.extensions.AbstractAFPExtensionObject class.
AFPPageSegmentElement This class extends the org.apache.fop.extensions.ExtensionObj class.
AFPPageSegmentElement.AFPPageSegmentSetup This is the pass-through value object for the AFP extension.
AFPPageSetup This is the pass-through value object for the AFP extension.
AFPPageSetupElement This class extends the org.apache.fop.extensions.ExtensionObj class.
 

Enum Summary
ExtensionPlacement An enumeration for placement instruction for AFP extensions.
